rules_text: When this creature dies, discover 3. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The little creatures roam Vikaar's wastelands, accruing trinkets for self-repair.[/i]
